text.section: In the absence of actual fraud or gross disparity in the determination, the fair value of stock determined by the board of directors and recorded in the resolution authorizing the issuance is conclusive.

Unless the articles of incorporation provide otherwise, holders of the following securities do not have any preemptive rights:
Bonds, notes, debentures, or other obligations convertible into stock; and
Stock not presently entitled to be voted in the election of directors.
